10_useSSH.title: Use default SSH Client
10_useSSH.description:
Use default built-in SSH client (ie. on Mac, Linux, etc.).
The Password is always copied to clipboard with this option

20_copyPassword.title: Copy Password
20_copyPassword.description: Always copy the password to my clipboard instead of using it as a parameter

30_scanConfig.title: Scan for ftpconfig files
30_scanConfig.description: If this is enabled, you need to fill in the folder(s) to scan below.

40_globalProjectFolder.title: Scan these folders for .ftpconfig files
40_globalProjectFolder.description: This is the absolute path where all your projects lie in their separate folders. I.e: `/home/user/my-atom-projects` with subfolders `/project1`, `/project2`, etc. If you have multiple such "global" folders, you can enter multiple paths separated by comma.

50_searchPrimary.title: Configure display format of search results
50_searchPrimary.description: Define your custom format for the first line of search results, use keywords `{projectName}` for `rs_name`, `{folderName}` for the folder's name, and/or `{hostName}` for the `host` in .ftpconfig. HTML supported.
